snippet: The stars attended a showing for the movie, which tells the true story of a police officer found to have cancer who fought for the right to leave her pension to her lesbian partner.
lead_paragraph: The stars attended a showing for the movie, which tells the true story of a police officer found to have cancer who fought for the right to leave her pension to her lesbian partner.

headline.main: Scene City: Julianne Moore and Ellen Page at ‘Freeheld’ Screening
